flawed_nl_solution:
Curtis had the Salisbury steak for $16 and Rob had the Chicken Fried Steak at $18 so their meal cost 16+18 = $<<16+18=38>>38
They ate 3 pm so their meal is half off so their meal cost 38/2 = $19
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 38. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
